title: Rename GPL.TXT to LICENSE.txt
message:
Rename GPL.TXT to LICENSE.txt

We are already GPLv3, put the file in the place for automated tools.

title: Update manifest
message: Update manifest

title: Replace the coin animation with a slide. This is smoother.
message:
Replace the coin animation with a slide. This is smoother.

Hopefully, this will reduce people's perception that the coin is biased even
though I've done large trials to show it isn't.

title: Hitting the home button button in settings/coin shouldn't reset score.
message: Hitting the home button button in settings/coin shouldn't reset score.

title: Oopps.
message: Oopps.

title: More features:
message:
More features:
- Customizable starting life
- Coin flips on its own first time when coin selected.
- I put "clear" back under the menu in Android to prevent accidental pressing.

title: Honeycombize the coin activity and add larger resources.
message: Honeycombize the coin activity and add larger resources.

message: Use Honeycomb style preferences when appropriate

title: Move to xml based preferences so I can do the Honeycomb trick.
message: Move to xml based preferences so I can do the Honeycomb trick.

message: Update version code to 8.

title: Special Landscape layouts for Honeycomb tablets
message:
Special Landscape layouts for Honeycomb tablets

Adds spacing between the columns in 1/2/3 player layouts.

message: Now using the compatibility shim for the activity bar icons

title: Minimal layout support for Honeycomb. Bringing in the compat library.
message: Minimal layout support for Honeycomb. Bringing in the compat library.

message: Remove nonfree from name for normal release.

Add multiplayer support to LifeCounter.

This exposes a bug in my LayoutView! The rendering seems wrong when
